original: @237b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @237b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sapta ta th'a ga ta sto tra:/
analyzed: sapta ta th'a ga ta sto tra:/
translated: Sapta-tathagata-stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi bstod pa //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi bstod pa //
translated: Praise of the Seven Tathagatas

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Manjushri.

original: 'gro ba'i bla ma lha mi 'jig rten phyir mchod cing //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bla ma lha mi 'jig rten phyir mchod cing //
translated: You are worshipped by gods and humans, the teachers of the world,

original: thugs rjes gsal zhing gzhan la phan pa'i thar pa ston //
analyzed: thugs rjes gsal zhing gzhan la phan pa'i thar pa ston //
translated: And you reveal liberation, clear compassion, and benefit for others.

original: srid gsum chu chen mthar phyin bde 'gror son pa po //
analyzed: srid gsum chu chen mthar phyin bde 'gror son pa po //
translated: You have crossed the great river of the three existences and reached the happy realms.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Tathagata Vipashin.

original: srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' dang pha rol med pa 'di //
analyzed: srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' dang pha rol med pa 'di //
translated: This ocean of existence, without end or shore,

original: 'jig rten nub cing 'dug pa rab tu gzigs nas kyang //
analyzed: 'jig rten nub cing 'dug pa rab tu gzigs nas kyang //
translated: You see the world sinking and dwelling there,

original: phan gdags phyir ni chos rnams ston pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: phan gdags phyir ni chos rnams ston pa gang yin pa //
translated: And you teach the Dharma for the sake of benefiting.

original: rgyal ba gtsug tor mnga' ba de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rgyal ba gtsug tor mnga' ba de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to that Jina, Ushnisha Lord.

original: nyi zla dag las 'das pa'i gzi brjid mnga' ba des //
analyzed: nyi zla dag las 'das pa'i gzi brjid mnga' ba des //
translated: You possess the splendor that surpasses the sun and moon,

original: ye shes dang ni spyod pa'i ngang tshul rnams las kyang //
analyzed: ye shes dang ni spyod pa'i ngang tshul rnams las kyang //
translated: And you are also the nature of wisdom and conduct.

original: rgya mtsho'i 'jing ltar gting dpag nus par @238a * //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i 'jing ltar gting dpag nus par @238a * //
translated: Like the depths of the ocean, it is impossible to fathom.üîΩ

original: mi 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba'i //
translated: Like the depths of the ocean, it is impossible to fathom.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩgang gi grags pa zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra ba yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pa de la phyag 'tshal lo // gang gi grags pa zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra ba yis //
translated: Homage to that protector of all buddhas.üîΩThe entire earth is illuminated as if by the light of the moon,

original: sa stengs mtha' dag rab tu brgyan par snang ba dang // au du mb'a ra'i me tog bzhin du rmad byung ba //
analyzed: sa stengs mtha' dag rab tu brgyan par snang ba dang // au du mb'a ra'i me tog bzhin du rmad byung ba //
translated: And the great sage is as wondrous as the udumbara flower.

original: thub dbang chen po log dang sel la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thub dbang chen po log dang sel la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the great lord of sages, Kanakamuni.

original: dri ma med cing rtag tu phan par mdzad pa dang // chags pa med pa gang gi dri ma med pa'i thugs //
analyzed: dri ma med cing rtag tu phan par mdzad pa dang // chags pa med pa gang gi dri ma med pa'i thugs //
translated: His stainless mind is always beneficial and free from attachment.

original: rnam par 'phro bas mun pa'i thibs po rab bcom zhing //
analyzed: rnam par 'phro bas mun pa'i thibs po rab bcom zhing //
translated: The darkness is destroyed by the light of his stainless mind.

original: lha yis mchod pa'i gser thub de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lha yis mchod pa'i gser thub de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to that golden sage, worshipped by the gods.

original: btso ma'i gser gyi phung po'i kha dog 'dra ba yi ;
analyzed: btso ma'i gser gyi phung po'i kha dog 'dra ba yi ;
translated: His body is the color of a heap of refined gold,

original: / gzi brjid 'bar ba nyi ma stong pas lhag pa mnga' //
analyzed: / gzi brjid 'bar ba nyi ma stong pas lhag pa mnga' //
translated: Shining with brilliance greater than a thousand suns.

original: skyi bo kun gyis phyag byas 'jig rten mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: skyi bo kun gyis phyag byas 'jig rten mchog gyur pa //
translated: He is the supreme one in the world, worshipped by all.

original: 'od srungs mtshan gsol gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'od srungs mtshan gsol gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the one who was named KƒÅ≈õyapa.

original: nyi ma'i 'od zer mang pos pad+ma'i tshal phye ltar //
analyzed: nyi ma'i 'od zer mang pos pad+ma'i tshal phye ltar //
translated: Just as the sun‚Äôs many rays open the lotus grove,

original: gsung gi 'od zer mang pos 'jig rten sad par mdzad //
analyzed: gsung gi 'od zer mang pos 'jig rten sad par mdzad //
translated: the Buddha‚Äôs many light rays awaken the world.

original: ston pa sh'akya thub pa thugs rje sgron ma can //
analyzed: ston pa sh'akya thub pa thugs rje sgron ma can //
translated: The Teacher ≈öƒÅkyamuni, the lamp of compassion,

original: mya ngan 'das ston gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das ston gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the one who teaches nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: gang gi byang chub skye ba gcig gis thogs gyur cing //
analyzed: gang gi byang chub skye ba gcig gis thogs gyur cing //
translated: The one who is hindered by only one birth to enlightenment,

original: byams pa zhes bya dga' ldan gnam gyi gnas na bzhugs //
analyzed: byams pa zhes bya dga' ldan gnam gyi gnas na bzhugs //
translated: called Maitreya, dwelling in the Tu·π£ita heaven,

original: sa stengs bde bar gshegs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa //
analyzed: sa stengs bde bar gshegs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa //
translated: who will become the Sugata on the surface of the earth,

original: de la bdag ni rtag tu dad pas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de la bdag ni rtag tu dad pas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: to him I always pay homage with faith.

original: 'das pa'i rgyal ba bdun po dang ni phyis gshegs pa //
analyzed: 'das pa'i rgyal ba bdun po dang ni phyis gshegs pa //
translated: The seven victorious ones of the past and the one who will come,

original: brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis bstod pa yis //
analyzed: brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis bstod pa yis //
translated: the eighth, the bodhisattva whom I praise,

original: bsod nams mtha' yas dpag med bdag gis gang thob pa //
analyzed: bsod nams mtha' yas dpag med bdag gis gang thob pa //
translated: the limitless, immeasurable merit that I have obtained

original: des ni sems can rnams kyang skyon dang bral gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi bstod pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: des ni sems can rnams kyang skyon dang bral gyur cig / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi bstod pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise of the seven tathagatas is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra wa rma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra wa rma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
translated: The Indian abbot Padmakara and the great translator-editor, the monk Rinchen Zangpo, translated and edited this text.
